name: Rosaria
desc: A sister of the church, though you wouldn't know it if it weren't for her attire. Known for her sharp, cold words and manner, she often works alone.

videoCollection.title: Collected Miscellany - "Rosaria: Purger of the Shadows" | Genshin Impact
New Character Demo - "Rosaria: No Overtime, Ever" | Genshin Impact
Version 1.4 "Invitation of Windblume" Trailer | Genshin Impact

voice.title: Hello
voice.desc:
Listen disciple, if you've got a problem you can't handle, then I'm the one for the job. But if you're looking for prayer, you'd better find some other Sister
...Huh? You're not a disciple?

voice.title: Chat: Boredom
voice.desc: Don't we have a job to do?

voice.title: Chat: Overtime
voice.desc: Everything is negotiable, except overtime.

voice.title: Chat: Life in Mondstadt
voice.desc: Work hard and live each day to the fullest. That is what life in Mondstadt is all about, isn't it?

voice.title: When It Rains
voice.desc: This will slow things down.

voice.title: When Thunder Strikes
voice.desc: ...What a nuisance.

voice.title: When It Snows
voice.desc: We should keep moving, but watch your step in the snow.

voice.title: When the Wind Is Blowing
voice.desc: Blessings from the Anemo Archon Barsibato? Wait... no, it's Bartobas...?

voice.title: Good Morning
voice.desc: *yawn* Good morning... I've missed morning mass, haven't I? Ugh, it starts too early anyway.

voice.title: Good Afternoon
voice.desc: I'd say I sleep even better in the afternoon sun. You should try it sometime.

voice.title: Good Evening
voice.desc: Good evening. Don't expect to see me at prayer tonight... And don't ask why.

voice.title: Good Night
voice.desc: Go ahead, take a break. I'll handle things here.

voice.title: About Rosaria: Sister
voice.desc: Me? I'm just another ordinary person. Church, work... I just do what I have to do.

voice.title: About Rosaria: Troubles
voice.desc: Each of the Sisters is worse than the next. If it's not about prayer, then it's about choir or some other thing I'm supposed to participate in... I'm trying to stay out of sight, so don't you dare tell them you saw me here.

voice.title: About Us: Beliefs
voice.desc: Perhaps a god has the power to protect everyone if they would choose to do so, but that would never happen. Otherwise, people's suffering couldn't ever be taken seriously.

voice.title: About Us: Prayer
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6

Pray. Not for the gods, nor the betterment of others... but for yourself.

voice.title: About Us: Battle
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6

Don't overdo it. Let me take care of the dirty work.

voice.title: About the Vision
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

A Vision... Could be proof of strength, or a medal for having survived... who knows? There're two sides to every coin. I won't limit my Vision with ceremonies and definitions. It witnesses me, and I witness it, that's all.

voice.title: Something to Share
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

You don't always know why good things happen, or why we should be happy about them. Heh... But if you ever face a problem too big to handle, don't give up hope. You never know, someone may be there to help, even if you can't see them.

voice.title: Interesting Things
voice.desc: I take no interest in plant life and the sort, but the dandelion is an exception. How such a simple flower could turn into such a delectable wine is beyond me. A glass of dandelion wine after work is even better than sleeping in on Sunday.

voice.title: About Diluc
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Isn't it obvious? There's more than meets the eye to that rich tycoon. He's confident, yet discreet... and even a little bit dangerous.

voice.title: About Kaeya
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Wine has its uses... like revealing someone's true colors, for example. Smooth talk is Kaeya's veil, but being me, I can see right through it. Hah, you should see him when he's drunk.

voice.title: About Venti
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

There's something extremely interesting about this bard... I can't quite put my finger on it. There's something that makes him different from the others in Mondstadt.

voice.title: About Barbara
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Barbara is like a thorn in my side, always nagging me about mass and choir practice. I wouldn't be surprised if Sister Victoria specifically asked her to keep an eye on me.

voice.title: About Jean
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

She's not only competent in her own work but also somehow manages to clear up various matters for others... Huh. Now that's a woman who deserves admiration.

voice.title: About Albedo
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

He's like an oil painting you find hanging on the wall in some ancient hall, profound and mysterious... hard to see through. But what can I say, I find people with stories... interesting.

voice.title: About Lisa
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Although I deplore those who play truant on a job, I respect her punctuality when it comes to closing up for the day.

voice.title: About Klee
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Trouble, and lots of it. Although, it is sort of a cute kind of trouble...

voice.title: About Varka
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

I'm sure Varka means well, but his long-winded conversations get real old real quick. Although, he does really care for those around him, doesn't he?

voice.title: About Her Father
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Father? I'm not familiar with the word. You could say that I don't have one — could also say I have many, too. What's it to you?

voice.title: More About Rosaria: I
voice.desc: Let's forgo the formalities. I'm here to finish a job. Just leave the dirty work to me.

voice.title: More About Rosaria: II
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 3

What's weird about a Sister without reverence for the gods? There are hunters who don't eat pork, and fisherman who don't eat fish, aren't there? Just because you do something doesn't mean you love to do it. That's how every job goes.

voice.title: More About Rosaria: III
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

This year's Dandelion Wine is sinfully good. Care for a glass?

voice.title: More About Rosaria: IV
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 5

Mondstadt is a beast of light, both old and young. Old in the sense that it constantly requires someone's protection, yet too young to ever survive on its own. That's why there's people like me. I care for Mondstadt just as the other Sisters care for the believers, we are all guiding that which we love onward on the path towards freedom. Huh? Why do I call it a beast of light? Because people like myself can only be found in the dark...

voice.title: More About Rosaria: V
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6

I sometimes feel that my former selves from years past still exist alongside me, urging me on. I'm sure you know the feeling, too. Even if you decide to venture down a new path, don't just abandon the former you. For that is the foundation upon which you now take footing. Do not fear your past, and do not be scared to come to grips with it.

voice.title: Rosaria's Hobbies
voice.desc: There are some troubles that only a stiff drink can take away. That being said, I never get drunk.

voice.title: Rosaria's Troubles
voice.desc: Ugh, definitely skipping next month's choir concert, but I bet Sister Victoria will be personally taking roll... What a nuisance.

voice.title: Favorite Food
voice.desc: Have you ever tried Beef Bourguignon? Big chunks of meat with the smooth taste of alcohol... Mmm, it's delectable.

voice.title: Least Favorite Food
voice.desc: You mean I'm supposed to dip this hash brown in jam? Ugh, this is sacrilege!

voice.title: Birthday
voice.desc: Today's your birthday, so if you have any dirty work that needs taking care of, I can give you a hand... Just don't tell anybody, got it?

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Intro
voice.desc:
Unlocks at ascension phase 1

Hmm, just what I needed.

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Building Up
voice.desc:
Unlocks at ascension phase 2

You have a job for me? I've got time.

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Climax
voice.desc:
Unlocks at ascension phase 4

Good. Getting stronger means finishing jobs quicker.

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion
voice.desc:
Unlocks at ascension phase 6

I'm no stranger to spilling blood, but never have I possessed such power before. For such blessings, I give you thanks.

voice.title: Elemental Skill: I
voice.desc: Hyah!

voice.title: Elemental Skill: II
voice.desc: Judgment!

voice.title: Elemental Skill: III
voice.desc: You can't run!

voice.title: Elemental Burst: I
voice.desc: Punishment!

voice.title: Elemental Burst: II
voice.desc: Shiver!

voice.title: Elemental Burst: III
voice.desc: Lights out...

voice.title: Opening Treasure Chest: I
voice.desc: ...Hm, there are a few interesting trinkets here.

voice.title: Opening Treasure Chest: II
voice.desc: I suppose it wasn't too much trouble.

voice.title: Opening Treasure Chest: III
voice.desc: That felt... pretty good.

voice.title: Low HP: I
voice.desc: Hmph. Things are getting interesting...

voice.title: Low HP: II
voice.desc: Looks like overtime today.

voice.title: Low HP: III
voice.desc: So you know your stuff, huh?

voice.title: Fallen: I
voice.desc: At least... no more... work.

voice.title: Fallen: II
voice.desc: Maybe this is just... fate's dark design.

voice.title: Fallen: III
voice.desc: Is this... my final job?

voice.title: Light Hit Taken: I
voice.desc: I see how it is.

voice.title: Heavy Hit Taken: I
voice.desc: Ugh, what a nuisance!

voice.title: Joining Party: I
voice.desc: I hear you've got a job for me.

voice.title: Joining Party: II
voice.desc: Make sure to keep up.

voice.title: Joining Party: III
voice.desc: Sooner we're done the better.

voice.title: Receiving a Gift: I
voice.desc: It seems that our tastes are aligned when it comes to food.

voice.title: Receiving a Gift: II
voice.desc: At least I'll be able to eat my fill with this.

voice.title: Receiving a Gift: III
voice.desc: Do you really like this food?

voice.title: Ally at Low HP: I
voice.desc: Let me handle this!

voice.title: Ally at Low HP: II
voice.desc: Don't try to be a hero!

desc.text: When Rosaria deals a CRIT Hit, her ATK SPD increases by 10% and her Normal Attack DMG increases by 10% for 4s.
The duration of the Ice Lance created by <color=#ffd780>Rites of Termination</color> is increased by 4s.

Increases the Level of <color=#ffd780>Ravaging Confession</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

<color=#ffd780>Ravaging Confession</color> 's CRIT Hits regenerate 5 Energy for Rosaria.
Can only be triggered once each time Ravaging Confession is cast.

Increases the Level of <color=#ffd780>Rites of Termination</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
<color=#ffd780>Rites of Termination</color> 's attack decreases opponents' Physical RES by 20% for 10s.

Rosaria is one of the sisters of Mondstadt's Church of Favonius.
Though she is just as much a woman of the cloth as the likes of Barbara and Jilliana, people tend to make a mental distinction between Rosaria and other members of the clergy.
While she might dress the part — at least, to a certain extent — her speech and actions do not reflect her office in the slightest.
Furthermore, she displays even less reverence towards the gods than the ordinary citizens, and she routinely skips her various church engagements.
She comes, goes, and acts in solitude, and if she were ever to make an appearance in the Cathedral, it would be to smoke in the rearmost pew.
Such a lone wolf is Rosaria that perhaps she should be considered a clergywoman in name only.

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 2</color>
If Rosaria has been lectured once, she has been lectured a thousand times before concerning her unorthodox behavior.
For some reason, however, she has never faced any serious consequences for her transgressions. She does not work together with her church colleagues and only rarely shows up to celebratory events in the city.
The strange and mysterious Rosaria moves about almost like a wisp of black smoke — blink, and you'll miss her as she disappears into thin air.
Her social interactions are never more than superficial, and the rest of the time she keeps herself to herself.
However, Sister Victoria would say that the ever good-natured Barbara is one person who has always made the effort to get close to Rosaria.
"Please don't smoke in the Cathedral..." "Could you try to attend the ceremony on time next time...?"
"And... Hey, come back, I'm still talking to you!"
Barbara is forever anxiously chasing after Rosaria, urging her to complete her various daily tasks.
Yet even when faced with Barbara, the beloved idol of Mondstadt, Rosaria remains completely unmoved.
Surely her heart can't be completely made of stone?

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 3</color>
Rosaria's movements are unpredictable. She often leaves without notifying anyone and can be gone for up to several days on end.
During these times, none of her church colleagues know where to find her.
One of the sisters who took it upon herself to observe Rosaria once groused that "even a stray cat should at least give you notice before running off..."
Rosaria uses these disappearances to do work that only she can do in corners unseen by others.
An unfamiliar merchant, a suspicious traveler — are these people threats to Mondstadt?
She investigates, shadows, and if necessary, interrogates.
If they must disappear, then Rosaria shall be the last person they meet.
Such dark work, which cannot see the light of day, is to be done by her hand alone.
She always sets out after the sun has set, finishing her work in one fell swoop. Sometimes, if she makes it back by the crack of dawn, she gets to usher in the day ahead with a glass of breakfast wine.
The people of Mondstadt live in the golden sunlight, but Rosaria dwells under the silver moonlight.
It is a cold, piercing light... just like that of the ice she forms with her Cryo abilities.
"There are some things that young people need not know," Rosaria thinks.
Though, in her eyes, "young people" means all citizens of Mondstadt who live in the light of the sun, regardless of their age.

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4</color>
Like a puff of smoke, the lackadaisical Rosaria is impossible to pin down.
Nevertheless, once she takes on a job, she can be relied on to handle it with the utmost professionalism.
"Lazy" is the last word that anyone would use to describe her ruthless interrogations of suspicious individuals.
She also possesses exceptional strength and knows the weaknesses of the human body like the back of her hand — and has no reservations about using this knowledge to kill.
People know her as the lazy, chain-smoking sister, but behind the scenes, she is a formidable purveyor of justice.
A strange fate for one who ostensibly basks in the light of the gods.
What led her to become a blood-soaked slayer? Why does she stay silent while others praise the gods for their protection?
Perhaps it should come as no surprise that Rosaria was not born and bred in Mondstadt.
"A city that is fortunate enough to be boring always needs someone to do the dirty work..."
Rosaria stubs her cigarette out as she speaks in her characteristically languid manner.
"And as far as I'm concerned, the things I deal with are far simpler than living the life of a traditional sister."

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 5</color>
Rosaria may not be one to attend prayer meetings, but that does not mean she doesn't have her own theological viewpoints.
In her view, freedom is the spiritual pillar of Mondstadt's people, and it is the very thing that caused her to end up here in the first place.
Rosaria was born in a remote mountain village, but was taken from her home shortly after birth by the very same bandits who drenched it in blood.
Raised by those crooks, she learned how to fight, sometimes thieving, other times doing odd jobs for the crew.
She was their servant, but also their tool, a crook, yet still a child.
She fought against outsiders and her comrades alike, and growing up was a constant battle for survival against the hunger and cold.
Rosaria's youth was just like Mondstadt's sunset — blood-red from horizon to horizon, and so fleeting that night had fallen before she'd had the chance to stop and take in the view.
Ultimately, the bandit crew was wiped out by the Knights of Favonius. As their youngest member, Rosaria was judged to have a chance of rehabilitation.
Grand Master Varka brought her to Mondstadt. Sincerely hoping that she might someday fit in here, he advised her:
"Go to the Cathedral and be cleansed by the light of our archon. You still have the chance to turn your fate around and live a normal life."
But Varka had not counted on Rosaria constantly skipping classes and dodging hymnal.
She would rather hunt in the wild than settle into a life of dutiful service as a sister. As far as she was concerned, the golden sunlight was not so much cleansing as blinding.
For Rosaria had long since come to understand that she was a child of the moonlight, and it was inevitable that she would someday return to the embrace of darkness.

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6</color>
Rosaria, the Church's number one truant, became infamous for her absence very early on.
"Miss Rosaria, please, show a little more circumspection in your actions! You are a member of the Church. How is it appropriate that you simply never turn up for hymn practice?"
"Please calm down, Sister Ophila. Miss Rosaria, I'm told that you have never attended a single one of your compulsory classes. Is that so?"
"Yes."
"Mother Maria, please look at this... Rosaria's theological essay is an utter mess!"
"Miss Rosaria, if I may ask frankly... do you intend to do any work at all here at the Church?"
"No. I've already found other work."
Rosaria never showed so much as a hint of anxiety in any of these exchanges. What's more, it was true — she had indeed found other work for herself, and much darker work at that.
The unexpected twist was that she would ultimately end up doing this work under the aegis of the Church.
Rosaria the novice did not leave the clergy, but instead became Sister Rosaria without much incident.
Nevertheless, when she's not on a mission, she does everything she can to avoid attending church activities, instead heading to the taverns to drink or scaling the city walls to view the scenery.
And when she simply cannot escape a church engagement, you can be sure that she will be the first to leave.
The instant the workday is done, Rosaria vanishes.
Whether by bright day or dark night, there is one principle that she will never transgress: no overtime.

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4</color>
A journal with a white cover. The words "Church of Favonius" are inscribed on the cover.
The handwriting is beautiful, but the content is the most of the most banal variety imaginable.
"Dandelion Wine — now eighty percent off!"
"Fisherman's Toast — an incredible flavor at an unbelievable price!"
"Crazy discounts on Wheat — ask at the counter and we'll grind it into Flour for you."
"Buy three Tomatoes and get one free!"
"Fresh Small Lamp Grass! Use it to light up your bathroom! Come on, Sir, have a look!"
There is something incongruous about a random assortment of marketplace cries and advertising slogans having been penned by such a graceful and elegant hand.
This journal is a relic from Rosaria's novice days.
Clearly, she must have skipped class and headed to the rooftops on the merchant street, bathing in the sun, listening to the eclectic cries of the street vendors, and committing them to paper.

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6</color>
Rosaria's Vision came to her on a particularly frigid night.
Things were getting desperate for the bandit gang — people were starving and the food supplies were dwindling.
Never able to eat her fill, Rosaria was driven by hunger to flee into the freezing wind rather than continue another second with the hard labor she was forced to endure.
One of the elders of the gang pursued her and brought her back.
He was the very person who had taken her from the village of her birth, and the one who had taught her how to kill.
"Fleeing makes you a traitor, and traitors can only earn their freedom through victory in combat."
The old bandit tossed Rosaria an old dagger.
"Well, come on then! Kill me, and you can leave this place. I'm long in the tooth now, while you've got youth on your side. You can do this, can't ya?"
No one thought that she would be able to kill him — and yet, the old lion would indeed fall by the newborn cub's claws.
Thus did the bandits lose an old member and welcome a new one that very night.
The bandits were reluctant to accept Rosaria at first since she had slain one of their own, but they quickly had a change of heart after seeing the Vision in her hand.
Surely, a Vision wielder had to be far stronger than some old coot who was about to kick the bucket right? And she ate less, to boot... They could save some food this way.
Meanwhile, a question crept into Rosaria's frozen heart:
Did he let me replace him on purpose? ...Could a false father have harbored genuine affection for a child he stole so arbitrarily?

value.name: Dinner of Judgment
value.desc: Rosaria's specialty. The seemingly dark thorns make it hard to know how to begin tucking in. After some effort, you manage to clear the ornamentation away... and to your surprise, the first taste of the tender chicken unveils a shockingly lovely taste. As Rosaria studies your reaction, she seems pleased.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>March 30, 2021</color>
"Where did Rosaria go off to this time...? Oh, has anyone seen her? There's choir practice today. Deacon Dahlia told me I must ask her to come!" —Barbara
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/273870</color>

<color=#ffd780>March 30, 2021</color>
Travelers \ (^ o ^) / ~
Today, let's get to know one of the sisters of Mondstadt's Church of Favonius — Rosaria!
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/273881</color>

<color=#ffd780>March 30, 2021</color>
"Choir practice? Sorry, but I don't participate in any of the Church's activities. And don't ask me to work overtime either."
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/274001</color>

<color=#ffd780>January 5, 2022</color>
Dear Travelers,
We will release the Alternate Outfits, which are partial redesigns of the default outfits of "Dandelion Knight" Jean (Anemo), "Gliding Champion" Amber (Pyro), "Thorny Benevolence" Rosaria (Cryo), and "Astral Reflection" Mona (Hydro).
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/1858365</color>

<color=#ffd780>January 24, 2022</color>
"Shh! Be quiet!"
"Rosaria, Paimon and I have specially prepared a meal of Dandelion Wine stew— eh? Where did Paimon go?"
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/2002953</color>

<color=#ffd780>January 24, 2022</color>
Looking for me? If you need my help, I've got time.
Ah, so you've also come to wish me a happy birthday? Thank you very much.
I've convinced everyone that I don't need a celebration, so, as you can see, I'm on vacation.
Want to go out of town? Okay. It would be nice to spend my day off with you.
Thanks to hou for the fantastic artwork!
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/2002954</color>

<color=#ffd780>January 24, 2023</color>
"I didn't think you'd find this place. Your tracking skills are remarkable."
"Is this my birthday present? Thank you very much."
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/15303631</color>

<color=#ffd780>January 24, 2023</color>
My birthday wish? Hmm, I have to deal with the vermin in Mondstadt first. Could you give me a moment?
I can take care of this myself and get it all done by sunset.I'm free to make plans after that.
Clocking off early is a better cause for celebration with friends than birthdays.
Thanks to スコッティ for the fantastic artwork!
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/15303649</color>

<color=#ffd780>January 24, 2024</color>
Did one of the Sisters tell you I'd be here? I guess they've all known me long enough now to have figured me out, huh...
Every year, I come to the tavern on my birthday for a glass of Dandelion Wine.
At first, they were all so worried that I'd end up getting drunk, so they'd follow me when they saw me heading to the tavern. But nowadays, they just tell me to relax and leave everything else to them.
Not bad, eh? I like it when people give me some space. Of course, it'd be even better if they didn't force me to attend choir concerts, but that's another story...
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/24561022</color>

<color=#ffd780>January 24, 2024</color>
"Good Hunter... Dish of the day... Sweet Madame."
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/24561023</color>

<color=#ffd780>January 24, 2025</color>
"Ahhh~ I'm going straight to bed after this drink. Morning prayers? Pfft, I'll make sure the sister on duty can't find me."
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/36579527</color>

<color=#ffd780>January 24, 2025</color>
It's said that the most dangerous place can turn out to be the safest, so today I decided to just "hide" in this church.
I didn't expect them to actually go outside searching for me, leaving the place so empty that it feels somewhat unfamiliar.
However, you don't seem to be affected by conventional thinking, given how quickly you've located me.
—Alright, since you are here, it's clear this hiding spot won't remain a secret for much longer. I need to move to the next location. Want to come along?
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/36579528</color>

<color=#ffd780>September 21, 2024</color>
"Yo, have a seat. It's not every day we get to enjoy ourselves!"
<color=#80c0ff>X:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/x.com/GenshinImpact/status/1837431586939158975</color>

customize.name: Favonius Lance
customize.desc: A polearm made in the style of the Knights of Favonius. Its shaft is straight, and its tip flows lightly like the wind.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Reasoning:</color>
Secondary Stat: <color=#ffd780>Energy Recharge</color>
Passive: CRIT Hits have a chance to generate a small amount of <color=#ffd780>Elemental Particles</color> , which will regenerate 6 <color=#ffd780>Energy</color> for the character.
While <color=#ffffff73>Favonius Lance</color> deals less damage than the other alternatives, its <color=#ffd780>Energy</color> production passive can lessen <color=#ffd780>Energy Recharge</color> needs for the whole team
<color=#ffffff>Source(s):</color>
Available from all Banners

customize.name: "The Catch"
customize.desc: In the distant past, this was the beloved spear of a famed Inazuman bandit.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Reasoning:</color>
Secondary Stat: <color=#ffd780>Energy Recharge</color>
Passive: Increases <color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst DMG</color> and <color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst CRIT Rate</color>
The <color=#ffd780>Energy Recharge</color> allows Rosaria to burst comfortably while the passive increases her <color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color> <color=#ffffff73>damage output which</color> constitutes the majority of her damage
<color=#ffffff>Source(s):</color>
Purchase from Inazuma Fishing Association

customize.name: Deathmatch
customize.desc: A sharp crimson polearm that was once a gladiator's priceless treasure. Its awl has been stained by the blood of countless beasts and men.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Reasoning:</color>
Secondary Stat: <color=#ffd780>CRIT Rate</color>
Passive: Increases <color=#ffd780>ATK</color> and <color=#ffd780>DEF</color> if there are at least 2 opponents nearby; If there are fewer than 2 opponents nearby, increases <color=#ffd780>ATK</color>
Improves Rosaria's passive which buffs <color=#ffd780>CRIT Rate</color> for the team and her overall damage output
<color=#ffffff>Source(s):</color>
Purchase Gnostic Hymn (Battle Pass)

customize.name: Dragon's Bane
customize.desc: A polearm decorated with an entwining golden dragon. Light and sharp, this weapon may very well kill dragons with ease.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Reasoning:</color>
Secondary Stat: <color=#ffd780>Elemental Mastery</color>
Passive: Increases <color=#ffd780>DMG</color> against opponents affected by <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> or <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color>
The <color=#ffd780>Elemental Mastery</color> <color=#ffffff73>secondary stat and the</color> passive are best utilized in <color=#ffe699>Melt</color> teams
<color=#ffffff>Source(s):</color>
Available from all Banners

customize.name: Staff of Homa
customize.desc: A "firewood staff" that was once used in ancient and long-lost rituals.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Reasoning:</color>
Secondary Stat: <color=#ffd780>CRIT DMG</color>
Passive: Increases <color=#ffd780>HP</color> , and provides an <color=#ffd780>ATK Bonus</color> based on the <color=#ffd780>Max HP</color> . When the <color=#ffd780>HP</color> is less than 50%, the <color=#ffd780>ATK</color> <color=#ffd780>Bonus</color> is further increased based on the <color=#ffd780>Max HP</color> .
Greatly boosts Rosaria's overall damage output
<color=#ffffff>Source(s):</color>
Limited Weapon Banner

customize.name: Staff of the Scarlet Sands
customize.desc: One of a paired set of scepters fashioned from obsidian. Legend has it that these staves grant the right to lead the people of the desert, but no retainer now lives who can verify the proper appearance of these regalia.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Reasoning:</color>
Secondary Stat: <color=#ffd780>CRIT Rate</color>
Passive: Increases <color=#ffd780>ATK</color> based on <color=#ffd780>Elemental Mastery</color> . When an <color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color> hits opponents, the equipping character will gain bonus <color=#ffd780>ATK</color> based on their <color=#ffd780>Elemental Mastery</color> .
<color=#ffffff73>The</color> passive is best utilized in <color=#ffe699>Melt</color> teams
<color=#ffffff>Source(s):</color>
Limited Weapon Banner

customize.name: Primordial Jade Winged-Spear
customize.desc: A jade polearm made by the archons, capable of slaying ancient beasts.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Reasoning:</color>
Secondary Stat: <color=#ffd780>CRIT Rate</color>
Passive: Increases <color=#ffd780>ATK</color> when hitting the enemy for 6s, with max 7 stacks. While in possession of the max stacks <color=#ffd780>DMG</color> is increased.
The passive can't be properly utilized with Rosaria due to her low on field time however the high <color=#ffd780>Base ATK</color> and <color=#ffd780>CRIT Rate</color> secondary stat make up for it
<color=#ffffff>Source(s):</color>
Limited Weapon Banner
Standard Banner

<color=#ffffff>Set Bonus:</color>
2-Piece Set: <color=#99ffff>Cryo DMG</color> +15%
4-Piece Set: Increases <color=#ffd780>Crit Rate</color> against frozen opponents by 40%
Prioritize <color=#ffd780>ATK Sands,</color> <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> <color=#ffd780>DMG Goblet, CRIT DMG Circlet</color>
<color=#ffffff>Team(s):</color>
<color=#99ffff>Freeze</color> teams that utilizes Rosaria's constant <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> application from her <color=#ffd780>Elemental</color> <color=#ffd780>Burst</color> to keep enemies frozen

<color=#ffffff>Set Bonus:</color>
2-Piece Set: <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> RES increased by 40%
4-Piece Set: Increases <color=#ffd780>DMG</color> against opponents affected by <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> by 35%
Prioritize <color=#ffd780>Elemental Mastery</color> <color=#ffffff73>/</color> <color=#ffd780>ATK Sands,</color> <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> <color=#ffd780>DMG Goblet, CRIT Rate</color> <color=#ffffff73>/</color> <color=#ffd780>CRIT DMG Circlet</color>
<color=#ffffff>Team(s):</color>
<color=#ffe699>Melt</color> teams that allow Rosaria to cause a <color=#ffe699>Melt</color> reaction using her <color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color> / <color=#ffd780>Burst</color>

<color=#ffffff>Set Bonus:</color>
2-Piece Set: <color=#ffd780>Elemental Mastery</color> +80
4-Piece Set: Increases equipping character's <color=#ffd780>ATK</color> or <color=#ffd780>Elemental Mastery</color> based on Elemental type of other characters in the party after triggering an elemental reaction
Prioritize <color=#ffd780>Elemental Mastery</color> <color=#ffffff73>/</color> <color=#ffd780>ATK Sands,</color> <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> <color=#ffd780>DMG Goblet, CRIT Rate</color> <color=#ffffff73>/</color> <color=#ffd780>CRIT DMG Circlet</color>
<color=#ffffff>Team(s):</color>
<color=#ffe699>Melt</color> teams that allow Rosaria to cause a <color=#ffe699>Melt</color> reaction using her <color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color> / <color=#ffd780>Burst</color>

<color=#ffffff>Set Bonus:</color>
2-Piece Set: <color=#ffd780>Energy Recharge</color> +20%
4-Piece Set: Increases <color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst DMG</color> by 25% of <color=#ffd780>Energy Recharge</color> . A maximum of 75% bonus <color=#ffd780>DMG</color> can be obtained in this way.
Prioritize <color=#ffd780>Elemental Mastery</color> <color=#ffffff73>/</color> <color=#ffd780>ATK Sands,</color> <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> <color=#ffd780>DMG Goblet, CRIT Rate</color> <color=#ffffff73>/</color> <color=#ffd780>CRIT DMG Circlet</color>
<color=#ffffff>Team(s):</color>
<color=#ffe699>Melt</color> teams that allow Rosaria to cause a <color=#ffe699>Melt</color> reaction using her <color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color> / <color=#ffd780>Burst</color>

<color=#ffffff>Set Bonus:</color>
2-Piece Set: <color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst DMG</color> +20%
4-Piece Set: Using an <color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color> increases all party members' <color=#ffd780>ATK</color> by 20% for 12s.
Prioritize <color=#ffd780>Energy Recharge</color> <color=#ffffff73>/</color> <color=#ffd780>ATK Sands,</color> <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> <color=#ffd780>DMG Goblet, CRIT Rate Circlet</color>
<color=#ffffff>Team(s):</color>
Teams that utilize Rosaria as a support for her <color=#ffd780>CRIT Rate</color> buff/ <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> application/Energy generation.

<color=#ffffff>Set Bonus:</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Blizzard Strayer</color> 2-Piece Set: <color=#99ffff>Cryo DMG</color> +15%
<color=#ffffff73>Noblesse Oblige</color> 2-Piece Set: <color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst DMG</color> +20%
<color=#ffffff>Team(s):</color>
Teams where Rosaria is utilized for her damage and other utilities, can be used in <color=#ffe699>Melt</color> or <color=#99ffff>Freeze</color> teams.

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to five consecutive spear strikes.
<color=#ffd780>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way.
<color=#ffd780>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Teachings of Ballad
materials.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Poetry is the soul of the land of the wind.
Poetry is the manifestations of beautiful feelings. On a beautiful day, the breezes carry with them poetry that touches the heart of people like the wind caressing the leaves.

materials.name: Recruit's Insignia
materials.desc: An insignia to identify the recruits. Makes one wonder about what the ones joining the Fatui's war machine were thinking.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Guide to Ballad
materials.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Poetry is the soul of the land of the wind.
Poetry is the manifestations of the will to encourage. In the dark days, the gales in the streets and alleyways whisper words of fury, like the battle drums, like the low rumbling before the storm.

materials.name: Sergeant's Insignia
materials.desc: An insignia with a different shape to distinguish the sergeants from new recruits. Perhaps there are complicated emotions behind it.

materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Philosophies of Ballad
materials.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Poetry is the soul of the land of the wind.
Poetry is the manifestations of the desire to spread the word. Though nothing is eternal, though nothing will be the same, the wind's poetry will still spread beyond the skies, the land, the seas to every corner of the world.

materials.name: Lieutenant's Insignia
materials.desc: An insignia to identify officers. The Fatui possess a colossal army, so there must be something extraordinary about the ones who achieved this rank within the group.

materials.name: Shadow of the Warrior
materials.desc:
A fragment of power that you obtained from defeating Childe, who had unleashed the might of his Delusion.
It is the product of a will to fight that has been honed over countless slaughters.
If humans do indeed have destinies, then his must surely have been twisted by such deeds. Why else, then, would he always be at the heart of every conflict?

materials.name: Crown of Insight
materials.desc:
A precious Talent Level-Up material.
Once a medium for the storage and transfer of wisdom in ancient times. Now, wisdom is found in ancient texts and in profound speech. Nevertheless, this Crown of Insight must still be able to impart some transcendent power and wisdom to its bearer.

desc.text:
Rosaria swiftly shifts her position to appear behind her opponent, then stabs and slashes them with her polearm, dealing <color=#99ffff>Cryo DMG</color> .
This ability cannot be used to travel behind opponents of a larger build.
Those who confess to Sister Rosaria will be granted no absolution. All sinners shall be met with the piercing cold of punishment proportionate to the weight of their sins.

Rosaria's unique take on this prayer ritual: First, she swings her weapon to slash surrounding opponents; then, she summons a frigid Ice Lance that strikes the ground. Both actions deal <color=#99ffff>Cryo DMG</color> .
While active, the Ice Lance periodically releases a blast of cold air, dealing <color=#99ffff>Cryo DMG</color> to surrounding opponents.
Judgment is such a tedious ordeal — much easier to skip that phase and get straight to the last rites. Rosaria was never very devoted to the Anemo God anyway, which makes performing them all too easy.
When Rosaria strikes an opponent from behind using <color=#ffd780>Ravaging Confession</color> , Rosaria's CRIT Rate increases by 12% for 5s.

Casting <color=#ffd780>Rites of Termination</color> increases CRIT Rate of all nearby party members (except Rosaria herself) by 15% of Rosaria's CRIT Rate for 10s.
CRIT Rate Bonus gained this way cannot exceed 15%.

At night (18:00–6:00), increases the Movement SPD of your own party members by 10%.
Does not take effect in Domains, Trounce Domains, or Spiral Abyss. Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

imgDesc.text:
Original Outfit - Executor's Thorns
Rosaria's outfit. Rosaria has heavily modified this particular Church of Favonius uniform.

galleryCharacter.key: Outfit - To the Church's Free Spirit

imgDesc.text:
Obtained Outfit - To the Church's Free Spirit
Rosaria's outfit. This seems to have been custom-made for her by the Church.
"Oh, come on! Everyone got this just for you!"
Barbara happily passed a wonderfully wrapped gift box to Rosaria, even as the latter looked on with a mix of suspicion and annoyance.
Tearing the packaging open, she found a note on the box cover across which elegant script flowed like music.
"Dear Sister Rosaria, we have asked Ms. Barbara to send this gift to you, but please, do open it somewhere where she can't see you."
Opening the box with her back turned, Rosaria discovered that the box contained still another note. It was thusly written in the same hand as before:
"Dear Sister Rosaria, we know that you don't appreciate having too many people know your birthday. However, this piece of information was written on your resume by Grandmaster Varka, so, on this important day, do allow the Church of Favonius to send you a new uniform, made just for you."
"If you're alright with it, stop being so aloof and be a normal Sister for once."
Deacon Dahlia (This letter was written at the request of Sister Victoria)
Obtained Outfit - To the Church's Free Spirit
Obtained Outfit - To the Church's Free Spirit

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Shivada Jade Sliver
materials.desc: Character Ascension Material.

materials.name: Valberry
materials.desc: A plump and translucent berry that has a fragrant smell and a sweet, refreshing taste. In the past, the storm watchers' only solace was the sweetness of this fruit and hope for the city's peace.

materials.name: Recruit's Insignia
materials.desc: An insignia to identify the recruits. Makes one wonder about what the ones joining the Fatui's war machine were thinking.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Shivada Jade Fragment
materials.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Sorry..."

materials.name: Hoarfrost Core
materials.desc:
The exposed core of a defeated Cryo Regisvine. Pure Cryo energy is contained within it.
Energy and thoughts that swell deep within the earth will eventually erupt on the surface. Even the deathly silent frost will attach to living things on the ground, turning even ordinary vegetation like vines into huge, vicious predators.
